sentences: This issue was first taken up by the COP on 28 November.
Parties noted proposals by Japan (FCCC/CP/2009/3), Tuvalu (FCCC/CP/2009/4), the US (FCCC/CP/2009/7), Australia (FCCC/CP/2009/5), Costa Rica (FCCC/CP/2009/6) and Grenada (FCCC/CP/2010/3).
During the resumed COP closing plenary on Saturday, 8 December, the COP agreed to continue consideration of this issue at its next session.
